name: Tea Ninja
description:
I really enjoy drinking green tea, in particular my favorite is Kukicha (also known as Karigane).
The only problem with this tea is that the leaves / twigs often slip out of the teapot and into the cup (and they are very annoying!).
So I think for this Jam a game in which we try to fill a cup by taking every drop of tea from teapot but avoiding the leaves, throwing them at a shuriken!

In the game I have also insert information about the various green teas and their brewing times.

GAMEPLAY:
Tap/click in any point to throw. 

If a drop of tea falls from the teapot, let it pass, if a kukicha leaf falls, destroy it.

Hold on until the infusion time ends (between 60 and 100 seconds) to win and earn your sip of Kukicha!

CREDITS:
This game is made in only 3 hour (02:59:00) for trijam #156
The graphics and 3d model i created them with Blender, Substance painter and Photoshop.
The game is made in Construct 3
